f0000_pair00_s0.png.instruction: Relax the corrugator supercilii to remove brow lowering (deactivate AU4). Smooth the glabellar region and eliminate vertical forehead tension. Release orbicularis oris compression to remove lip pressing (deactivate AU24). Relax mentalis to remove chin tension (deactivate AU17). Soften lower eyelid tension (reduce AU7). Bilaterally contract zygomaticus major to pull lip corners upward (activate AU12). Engage orbicularis oculi (pars orbitalis) to raise cheeks and create mild lower-lid compression (activate AU6). Part the lips slightly (activate AU25). Introduce slight mandibular depression for visible upper teeth (activate AU26). Allow mild upper lip elevation from smile mechanics (mild AU10). Keep identity, age, gender, skin tone, lighting unchanged. Only modify expression-related muscle activations.
